mod_input_atac.yml --> example input file for Taiji run. Lists the different states, replicates, and data types (ATAC and RNAseq). 
config_atac.yml --> example configuration file for Taiji run. Both this and mod_input_atac.yml are needed.
config_atac.slurm --> The file to run Taiji loading in packages and the 2 config files. 

make_scatterplot_taiji_2C.ipynb --> makes the figure for 2C from the Taiji results
make_scatterplot_taiji_prioritized_2D.ipynb --> makes the figure for 2D from the Taiji results
